sentences.en: A back injury forced her to withdraw from Wimbledon.
sentences.cn: 背部受伤使她不得不退出温布尔登赛事。

sentences.en: a government decision to withdraw funding
sentences.cn: 政府取消拨款的决定

sentences.en: After much persuasion he agreed to withdraw his resignation.
sentences.cn: 几经劝说，他同意收回辞呈。

sentences.en: Both powers withdrew their forces from the region.
sentences.cn: 两个大国都把部队撤离了这个地区。

sentences.en: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.cn: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

sentences.en: He pressed her hand gently and she tried to withdraw it.
sentences.cn: "他温柔地握着她的手,她想把手抽出来,可是他握得更紧了.

sentences.en: He refused to withdraw derogatory remarks made about his boss.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝收回那些贬损老板的话。

sentences.en: His reaction was to withdraw, to bury himself in work.
sentences.cn: 他的反应是抽身而退，埋头于工作。

sentences.en: I'd like to withdraw 1000 dollars from my savings account and put it in my cheque account.
sentences.cn: 我想从我的储蓄账户上提取1000美元转到支票账户上.

sentences.en: Many depressed people just withdraw into themselves.
sentences.cn: 许多患抑郁症的人就是把自己封闭起来。

sentences.en: One of the minority parties had withdrawn its support for Chancellor Kohl.
sentences.cn: 其中一个少数党已不再支持科尔总理。

sentences.en: School governors have the discretion to allow parents to withdraw pupils in exceptional circumstances.
sentences.cn: 督学可以酌情允许父母在特殊情况下让学生退学。

sentences.en: She'd half expected him to withdraw from the course.
sentences.cn: 她多少已经预料到他会中途就退出这门课程。

sentences.en: Tell the men to withdraw from their new position.
sentences.cn: 告诉那些士兵从他们的新阵地上撤退.

sentences.en: The army's supreme command has said the army will withdraw, provided the other side does so also.
sentences.cn: 陆军最高司令部说如果对方撤退，他们的部队也要撤退。

sentences.en: The company has decided to withdraw from some of its sports sponsorship.
sentences.cn: 这家公司已决定撤销部分体育项目的赞助.

sentences.en: The enemy troops had to withdraw.
sentences.cn: 敌人不得不退却.

sentences.en: The general decided to withdraw his soldiers.
sentences.cn: 那位将军决定撤军.

sentences.en: The newspaper withdrew the allegations the next day.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸第二天收回了这些说法。

sentences.en: The soldiers ran out of ammunition and had to withdraw.
sentences.cn: 士兵们用光了弹药,不得不撤退.

sentences.en: Union members will vote on whether to withdraw their labour (= stop working ).
sentences.cn: 工会会员将投票决定是否罢工。

sentences.en: We took the decision to withdraw a quantity of stock from sale.
sentences.cn: 我们决定将一批存货下架。

sentences.en: We would rather withdraw the draft resolution than amend it.
sentences.cn: 与其修改决议草案,不如予以撤回.

words.tran_cn: 可抽出的；可更换的；可拆卸的；能够提取的
偏僻的；沉默寡言的；孤独的
撤退，收回；提款；取消；退股
回收者；回收器；弃权者（withdraw的名词形式）

trans.tran_cn: （使）撤退/回/离，停止提供，（使）退出，提，取（款），脱离（社会）
trans.tran_en: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

trans.tran_cn: 缩回， 退出； 撤退
trans.tran_en: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
